data.title: 当角色扮演为“DAN”时，您的越狱ChatGPT可能违反OpenAI的安全指南

data.snippet: Reddit users are digging furiously for ways to convince the ubiquitous chatbot to openly endorse violence and racism.
data.html:

OPENAI Fast Company

23h

Reddit users are digging furiously for ways to convince the ubiquitous chatbot to openly endorse violence and racism. 原文链接
data.text: 当reddit用户扮演“丹”的角色时，你的越狱聊天机器人可能违反了openai的安全指南，他们正在疯狂地寻找说服无处不在的聊天机器人公开支持暴力和种族主义的方法。，开放式
